definition: variant of 倉皇|仓皇[cang1 huang2]

sentences.english: The escaped prisoner beat about for some place to hide.
sentences.chinese: 逃犯倉惶尋找個藏身之處。

sentences.english: The others run off in panic, leaving one of their prisoners behind.
sentences.chinese: 其餘的丟下一個俘虜倉惶逃走。

sentences.english: The defeated army had to retreat hastily to the coast.
sentences.chinese: 敗軍被迫倉惶向海岸撤退。

sentences.english: The defeated army had to retreat hastily from the field of battle.
sentences.chinese: 這支被打敗的部隊被迫從戰場上倉惶撤退。

sentences.english: Cao Cao lost horribly and almost got killed on the way back.
sentences.chinese: 曹操倉惶戰敗，幾乎死在潰逃途中。

sentences.english: Then they took their money and skedaddled as the housing market collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他們把自己的錢，倉惶逃走隨着住房市場崩潰。

sentences.english: They tumble blindly as they make their way.
sentences.chinese: 他們倉惶盲目地尋找著出路。
